div.p: Indicates the writing script of the content of an element (e.g., Cyrillic, Katakana). Content should be taken from ISO 15924 Codes for the Representation of Names of Scripts, or another controlled list, as specified in the scriptencoding attribute in control. May be used consistently in a multi-lingual finding aid to specify which elements are written in which script. Available on all non-empty elements.
